title: Mexican Chain Offers Burrito Bond To Investors
teaser: The minimum cost to invest in Chilango's expansion is $850. An investment of nearly $17,000 will get you 1 free burrito per week for 4 years which is the life of the bond â€” plus 18 percent interest.
